formula: Lim sup n->infinity (|a(n)|/(2*n)!)^(1/(2*n)) = 1.0688665046968199... = abs(1/r), where r is the complex root of the equation sin(r)*exp(2*r) - sin(r) + I*exp(2*r) = -I. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 02 2013
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
extensions: Prepended missing a(0)=0 from _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 02 2013
